item.title: Road needs re laying and has done for 7 years, 7th August
item.description:
Large curbs on the pavement and cracks and curbs in the road poorly repaired . Trip hazard while crossing the road. Also the cracks when driven over by anything larger than a small car, my property vibrates throughout. Caused cracks on the front of my property
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes left everywerr, 7th August
item.description:
Bikes on pavement,on resident bays on yellow lines and on corner preventing lorrys fom turning into pavillion road.this is aaccident waiting to happen .when are the council going to do something .am going to contact health and safety if nothing is done as this is dangerous for padestrians

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Basil Street, Chelsea, London

item.title: Dumping of waste at my front gate, 7th August
item.description:
Household waste being dumped right at my front gate. Pictures attached showed one of the sacks contain discarded parcel package is from an address across the street down the road - 78a Farleigh road Waste has stayed piled infront of my gate for wee

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Farleigh Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Cracked road causing vibrations, cracks, damage, and noise disturbances all day and night, 7th August
item.description:
Thoroughly ignored everytime I post. Westwood lane has had a new surface , when will hook lane be done. The cracks in the road vibrate through my property when a larger vehicle than a car goes past . It wakes me up throughout the night. Third post in two weeks, apparently not an issue. Not looked at and closed by the council. I feel the problem has deteriorated and requires further investigation.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Blackfen, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting not working, 7th August
item.description:
This is the 3rd time I’ve reported this issue the street light outside 89-91 Kevington Drive has not been fixed and out of action for 4 months now. This could cause an accident as it is a narrow road. Please take action and resolve. Regards Barry Marshall.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 91, Kevington Drive, St Mary Cray, London

item.title: Bottle banks in Morrisons Car Park Springfield Road, 7th August
item.description:
The bottle banks in Morrisons car park have not been cleared in a long time. Because the bins are full, people are using trolleys as a way to dispose of bottles. And there is glass over the floor. Can someone look into getting this cleared because a lot of young young people walk through Morrisons and its really dangerous with the glass on the floor. Plus as it gets hotter the smell from the bins is very strong and not pleasant.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Springfield Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
